description: Modified Higg's primes, i.e. next prime such that a(n+1) | a(1) ... a(n) and if none, first prime not listed.
mathematica: NextPrime[ n_Integer ] := Module[ {k = n + 1}, While[ ! PrimeQ[ k ], k++ ]; Return[ k ] ]; f[ n_List ] := (a = n; b = Apply[ Times, a ]; p = NextPrime[ Sort[ a ][[ -1 ]] ]; While[ ! IntegerQ[ b/(p - 1) ] && p < b, p = NextPrime[ p ] ]; If[ p > b, p = 2; While[ Position[ a, p ] != {}, p = NextPrime[ p ] ] ]; AppendTo[ a, p ]); Nest[ f, {2}, 50 ]
author: _Robert G. Wilson v_, Sep 26 2000
